meanings.sent1: The mezzotinted picture was very detailed and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a mezzotinted technique to create a soft effect in the print.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a mezzotinted image could look so realistic!
meanings.sent4: Her mezzotinted artwork seemed to come alive on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The mezzotinted colors blended together perfectly, creating a stunning piece.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance of a mezzotint print.
meanings.sent1: The old photograph had a mezzotinted look to it, giving it a vintage feel.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a mezzotinted finish, making it look like an antique.
meanings.sent3: She wore a dress that had a mezzotinted pattern, standing out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The sky at sunset was mezzotinted with shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The mezzotinted background added depth to the portrait, making it more interesting.
